hello.label: Hey

dashboard.subtitle: In order to use our platform, please complete the onboarding process.
dashboard.validGovernment: Use a valid government-issued photo ID.
dashboard.residencePermit: A residence permit is also a valid identity card.

login.haveAccount: Do not have an account yet?

questionnaire.intro: To proceed to the next step, we'll need you to fill in this short questionnaire.
questionnaire.referralsQuestion: 1. How many referrals are you initially planning to bring to Axiance?
questionnaire.countriesToAttractQuestion: 2. What are the countries / regions are you planning to attract referrals from?
questionnaire.modeOfCommunication: 3. What is your main mode of communication with your referrals?
questionnaire.servicesQuestion: 4. Are you offering any services to your referrals?
questionnaire.servicesWebsiteQuestion: 5. Do you have a website presenting your services or that referrals visit to get familiar with the broker?
questionnaire.servicesWebsiteQuestionYes: If yes, please provide the link to your website:
questionnaire.regulatedQuestion: 6. Are you regulated by any Financial services Authority?
questionnaire.financialServicesQuestion: 1. Please provide name of the Financial services Authority in your country and your registration number.
questionnaire.regulatorName: 2. Name of the regulator of this financial service authority
questionnaire.regulatorWebsite: 3. Website of the regulator of this financial service authority
questionnaire.financialCrimeQuestion: 4. Were you, as an introducer, subject to any legal action Anti Money Laundering Rules or any matter relating to financial crime?

verifyEmail.digitCode: Insert the 6-digit code found in the email in order to verify your email.

header.title: A global investment network.

header.text: Benefit from our toolkits and the support to grow your business globally, because we want you to do well.

supportForm.title: Contact Us

partner.title: Why become a Partner
partner.subTitle: By joining us, you can grow your business with a partner that places transparency and security above all.

ib.title: IB Benefits
benefits: Smart tools, widgets & dedicated partner link to help you track every click, impression, and registration
Customised trading conditions for you and your clients
Superior trading platform and tools to boost your trading experience
Advanced PAMM solutions to better manage your clients’ investments
A fully transparent and regulated trading environment where your and your clients’ data and fund security comes first
Dedicated tools to help you track your earnings in real time
Tailor-made agreements to meet your unique needs
Smooth integration with your region’s most trustworthy payment solutions

client.title: Client Benefits
benefits: Custom trading conditions, depending on the account type
One-of-a-kind experience with our flexible trading platforms: MT4, Status, Axiance proprietary web-trading solution
Comprehensive Trading Central, especially attractive for advanced traders
A wide range of asset choices, time frames, and markets
Access to free educational materials, webinars, and intelligent trading tools
A wide range of payment methods to fund their account by: credit/debit card, wire transfer & region-specific e-Wallets

promote.title: Promote
promote.text: Share your partner link with clients & partners

introduce.title: Introduce
introduce.text: Your clients & partners become our clients & partners

earn.title: Earn
earn.text: The more your clients trade, the more you earn (commission + performance fee).

more.title: Earn More
more.text: Refer a partner/IB and earn even more. Add a mark-up fee on top of their commission.

accounts.title: Freedom Of Choice
accounts.text: Whether your clients are professional traders looking for new opportunities to grow your network, EA developers or money managers, we have a flexible range of business solutions to suit their needs.
accounts.registerText: Register with us today, start introducing clients, and enjoy the payouts.

cookies.title: This website uses cookies.
cookies.text: We use cookies to provide you a personalised experience. By using this website you automatically consent that we use cookies.

cookieWarning.cookieWarningMessage: We use cookies to provide you a personalized experience. By using this website you automatically consent that we use cookies.

thankYouPageUpload.thankYouSubtitleUpload:
That’s great, you’ve submitted us all the required documents. 
 Our agent will now complete your verification process and we will back to you shortly.

thankYouPageQuestionnaire.thankYouSubtitle: Thank you for completing the questionnaire, that’s great! We’ll now need you to upload the required legal documents in order to proceed with your onboarding as an Axiance IB.

illegal.illegalSubtitle: You are not allowed to register. We are unable to continue your onboarding, as Axiance does not provide services to any individual or entity suspected/convicted of any illegal activity.
